bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Letter from Luther M. Cornwall Co. to Philip Showalter Hench, [19--]

div1.p: The Luther M. Cornwall Co. informs Hench which books are available for sale.

div1.head: Letter from Luther M. Cornwall Co. to Philip Showalter Hench, [19--]
div1.opener:
LUTHER M
CORNWALL
COMPANY
723 ELEVENTH STREET N W · WASHINGTON D C · NATIONAL 4253
Americana · Government Publications · Choice Books
Dear Dr. Hench:
div1.p:
We have just located the following additional titles:
REPORTS OF THE WAR DEPARTMENT:
1898. v. 3 Ordnance 1.50
1899 v. 1 pt 2 Bureau Reports 1.50 - I have
1900 v. 1 pt 10 Phil Islands 2.00 - no
1xx 13 Rpt of Mil Gov of P.I. 2.00 - no
Ordnance 1.50
v. 8 pt 6 Chief of Engineers 1.50
1901 Ordnance 1.50
v. 2 pt 1 Engineers 1.50
v. 1 pt 8 Phil. Is. Comm 2.00
v. 1 pt 1 Sect of War, Misc. Rpts 1.50 - party
1902 v. 2 prs 2, 3, 4 and supp. Engineers 1.50 ea
Ordnance 1.50
10 pt 2 Phil. I. Comm 2.00
11 Acts of Phil Comm 2.00
8 Misc Reports 1.50 - ply I have
Also. 1899 Ordnance 1.50
v. 1 pt 1 Sect of War and Misc Rpts 1.50
div1.closer: LMC Law Books - New and Used
